mains.name: Banquet Burger
mains.description: 6 oz prime rib beef patty, bacon, smoked cheddar, pineapple jalapeno relish, garlic mayo and fresh cut fries

mains.name: Wedge Salad
mains.description: iceberg lettuce, tomatoes, onions, crispy shallots, bacon and chives layered with house made blue cheese dressing

mains.name: Falafel Salad Bowl
mains.description: crunchy falafel, grape tomatoes, cucumber, smoked paprika hummus, marinated chickpeas and lemon tahini vinaigrette

mains.name: Lobster Roll
mains.description: canadian atlantic lobster salad in a toasted brioche roll, served with fresh fried potato chips and greens in grapefruit vinaigrette

mains.name: Thai Curry Moules Frites
mains.description: PEI mussels cooked in a spicy coconut broth with asian herbs and a side of fresh cut fries

mains.name: Fried Chicken
mains.description: crispy fried chicken tenders served with bibb lettuce, house pickled cucumber, accompanied with a hot honey and dill ranch sauce
